actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require retail distributors of gasoline to display their gasoline prices so as to be clearly visible to persons operating motor vehicles on adjacent highways.

summary.text: Gasoline Price Display Act - Requires retail distributors of gasoline to display their gasoline prices so as to be clearly visible to persons operating motor vehicles on adjacent highways.

titles.title: A bill to require retail distributors of gasoline to display their gasoline prices so as to be clearly visible to persons operating motor vehicles on adjacent highways.
